mac_address.ui:help: Enter a 48 bit MAC address in colon separated format; for example, 00:00:0A:BB:28:FC

ip_address.ui:help: Enter an IP Address. The field value must include a IPv4 address without subnet mask; for example, 192.168.3.120

output_schema.title: Search ip or mac schema command Playbook Output

___results.description: Array holding the specific output details in case of success. Each object of the array would be command_output and device name pair.

___device_name.description: name of the device for which results are displayed
___device_name.title: Device Name

___command_output.description: Results of the show interfaces command executed on the device. The jinja template matching this command, vendor and family would give output of the below format. This command_output translates to device_op_results in the PR uve
___command_output.title: Each playbook's command_output for this specific command.

___interface_names.description: Display Interface Names that belong to this mac_address.
___interface_names.title: Interfaces Name(s)

items.description: Name of each interface that belongs under this mac_address

___device_name.description: Device name on which the interface was learnt
___device_name.title: Device Name
